projects.name: artMov
projects.description: Smaller project created for client from creative industry, more specifically marketing and video making. Website is oriented mostly around media, foremost about changing visible background video depending on states (chosen project). Service setup at OVHCloud.

projects.name: Presstito
projects.description: On of our bigger projects at Strona Agency. I was responsible for hosting the app, creating whole backend (CMS, user authentiaction and management, etc) and frontend of user panel, single investition and investitions list page and shared component with latest investitions.

projects.name: Cinead
projects.description: Similar to ArtMov project, created for client working in marketing and video making but with more simplistic style and multiple animations. Fully coded and hosted by me.

projects.name: Pracownia Terapii i Rozwoju
projects.description: Another small and simplistic project. I was responsible for creating blog with backend designed around it.
